title: Here's a curated reading list of 20 articles up to 2022 on fake news detection, misinformation characterization, and strategies to address false information and media bias

author.literal: **"Fake News Detection on Social Media: A Data Mining Perspective"** - Shu, K., Sliva, A., Wang, S., Tang, J., & Liu, H.
**"The Spread of True and False News Online"** - Vosoughi, S., Roy, D., & Aral, S.
**"A Survey on Fake News: Fundamental Theories, Detection Methods, and Opportunities"** - Zhou, X., & Zafarani, R.

title: **"Characterizing and Detecting Fake News in Social Media: A Survey"**
**"Leveraging the Crowd to Detect and Reduce the Spread of Fake News and Misinformation"**
container-title: Journal of Applied Research in Memory and Cognition

author.literal: **"The Science of Fake News"** - Lazer, D. M. J., Baum, M. A., Benkler, Y., Berinsky, A. J., Greenhill, K. M., Menczer, F., ... & Zittrain, J. L.
**"Fake News Detection Using Deep Learning"** - Ahmed, H., Traore, I., & Saad, S.
**"Fake News on Social Media: People Believe What They Want to Believe When It Makes No Sense at All"** - Allcott, H., & Gentzkow, M.

title: **"The Role of the Crowd in Countering Misinformation: A Case Study of the COVID-19 Infodemic"**
container-title: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences

title: **"Combating Fake News: A Role for Computational Social Science in the Fight Against Digital Misinformation"**
Journal of Computational Social Science

author.literal: **"A Survey on Misinformation Detection Using Natural Language Processing"** - Oshikawa, R., Qian, J., & Wang, W. Y.

container-title: Proceedings of the 28th International Conference on Computational Linguistics

title: **"Fake News Detection: A Hybrid CNN-RNN Based Deep Learning Approach"**
container-title: Proceedings of the 2017 ACM on Conference on Information and Knowledge Management

author.literal: **"The Echo Chamber Effect on Social Media"** - Flaxman, S., Goel, S., & Rao, J. M.

title: **"Media Bias and the Role of User Feedback: An Analysis of User Comments on News Articles"**
container-title: Proceedings of the 2009 International Conference on Computational Science and Engineering

title: **"The Role of Social Media in the Dissemination of Fake News"**

author.literal: - Tandoc Jr, E. C., Lim, Z. W., & Ling, R.

title: **"The Effects of Exposure to Misinformation on Beliefs About Vaccine Safety and Intentions to Vaccinate"**
PLOS ONE

author.literal: **"The Impact of Fact-Checking on Misinformation and Misperceptions"** - Nyhan, B., & Reifler, J.
**"Detecting Fake News on Social Media with Graph Neural Networks"** - Monti, F., Frasca, F., Eynard, D., Mannion, D., & Bronstein, M. M.

title: **"The Role of Algorithms in Reducing the Spread of Fake News"**
First Monday
**"Combating Fake News: An Agenda for Research and Action"**
Stanford Internet Observatory

These articles cover a range of topics from the technical aspects of fake news detection to the psychological and social implications of misinformation, providing a comprehensive overview of the field
